description: Just choose a program and Genesis Vision will automatically copy the trades from your account. You will be able to withdraw your investment or exit trades at any point in time.
title: Follow

tooltips.equity: Current market value of investments in the program, taking into account the profit/loss of open positions.
tooltips.trades: Number of trades executed during the selected date range.
tooltips.name: Name of the program
tooltips.drawdown: Maximum drawdown of the program during the selected date range.
tooltips.profit: Profit during the selected date range.
